name: Movies of Denzel Washington Online Trivia | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: What individuals are being killed in "The Pelican Brief"?
questions.explanation:
Supreme Court Justices.

	The movie is taken from one of the earlier John Grisham novels. Both Grisham and Washington moved on to better things.

questions.text: Washington starred in "Remember the Titans'. Who were the Titans?
questions.explanation:
Football team.

	This is an enjoyable movie that deals with the human side of sport. Washington is the coach.

questions.text: Washington had a key role in "Antwone Fisher". What role did he play?
questions.explanation:
Psychiatrist.

	Washington plays a psychiatrist who treats the title character. Despite the fact that the movie didn't do all that well, it's a very solid film. The movie is based on a true story (and was written by Fisher).

questions.text: Who co-starred with Washington in "Courage Under Fire"?
questions.explanation:
Meg Ryan.

	Washington investigates the combat-related death of Meg Ryan and tries to ascertain what really happened. With Lou Diamond Phillips.

American Civil War.

	This was an early role for Washington (and a supporting Oscar, too). Matthew Broderick stars.

questions.text: In "Man on Fire", Washington plays what type of character?
questions.explanation:
Bodyguard.

	Washington hires on to protect a little girl from possible kidnapping.The movie is long, but holds one's interest.

questions.text: Who was Washington's adversary in "Crimson Tide"?
questions.explanation:
Gene Hackman.

	This fine drama pits Washington against the commander of the sub, the veteran Gene Hackman. The two old pros are at their best.

questions.text: In "Philadelphia", Washington has to deal with an individual who suffers from what affliction?
questions.explanation:
AIDS.

	Tom Hanks plays the man with the disease; he got an Oscar for his performance. Washington plays his attorney.

questions.text: Which movie does NOT include Washington in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Jungle Fever.

	"Fever" stars Wesley Snipes. "Masala" was early in Washington's career,"Wife" was a light comedy that didn't do particularly well, "Siege" was an action story.

questions.text: Which movie featured Washington as a man fighting against an inane health care system?
questions.explanation:
John Q.

	All of the movies star Washington. "Virtuosity" was a sci fi movie. "Hurricane" was about the boxer, "Hurricane" Carter. "Training Day" was an action tale that earned Washingon an Oscar (despite a brilliant performance by Russell Crowe in "Beautiful Mind".)
